resources.string: You need at least one premium content pack to use this feature. Unlock one now?
This skin is a premium feature. Unlock it now?
This background is a premium feature. Unlock it now?
Disable features (e.g. background shuffle, in-game options menu) and lower overall graphical quality to improve in-game performance?\n\nYou will need to restart Quantro to change this setting.

Enable features (e.g. background shuffle, in-game options menu) and improve overall graphical quality at the expense of in-game performance?\n\nYou will need to restart Quantro to change this setting.
The next game you begin will use this setting
The next lobby you create or enter will use this setting
You will need to restart Quantro for this change to take effect
Hide or show the status bar
Low Quality: Simple shapes, colors and animations. High performance, low memory requirements.
Mid Quality: More complex blocks and drop-shadows. Average performance and memory requirements.
High Quality: Better animations. Low-to-mid performance, high memory requirements.
Only low-quality graphics are supported on this device.
Lower to improve performance and frame rate
Resolution is fixed on this device
Rotate \"Next\" and \"Reserve\" piece previews by 90 degrees for a better fit
Show \"Next\" piece preview on the right, \"Reserve\" on the left
Disable features and reduce graphical quality to improve in-game performance
Performance is prioritized automatically on this device.
For competitive players: skips animations for faster, more responsive gameplay
Colors used for game pieces: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Additional visual detail to help differentiate colors. May reduce frame rate.
This device does not support background shuffle
Show the current in-game background in menus
None: Plain black background. Best frame rate.
Pieces: A low-contrast stack of tetrominoes.
Rhombi: Diamonds layered over each other.
Skin used for Quantro pieces: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Skin used for Retro pieces: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Colors used for Quantro pieces: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Colors used for Retro pieces: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Completely mute Quantro when your phone\'s ringer is set to silent.
Play music and sound effects through speakers or headphones
Music played in the main menu: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Music played in the multiplayer lobbies: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Display in-game Quantro gameplay reminders: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Always start 1-player games with the most-recent custom setup (starting level, garbage rows, etc.)
Warn before quitting a game with the \'Back\' button
Your name, shown to all multiplayer opponents: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Your name, shown to all multiplayer opponents
Default name for WiFi multiplayer lobbies: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Default name for Wifi multiplayer lobbies
Default name for Internet multiplayer lobbies: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Default name for Internet multiplayer lobbies
Use the Status Bar to display lobby chat messages when in a game or in another app
Gamepad: touchscreen \"gamepad\" covering the entire screen. Recommended for 4\" or smaller screens.
Gesture: drag and fling pieces using gestures. Recommended for 5\" or larger screens.
Buttons appear on-screen while they are pressed
Hold Left or Right to quickly slide in that direction
Fall Quickly: pieces fall more quickly while the \"drop\" button is held
Drop Immediately: pressing \"drop\" will immediately drop the piece to its landing position
Pieces automatically land and lock when the \"drop\" button is pressed (prevents downward-leans)
Drop and lock a piece immediately by double-tapping the \"drop\" button
Place turn buttons on the bottom row and move buttons above
Standard: The \"drop\" button matches others in width
Panel-to-Panel: The \"drop\" button fits exactly between the left and right side panels
Custom: Scale the \"drop\" button width below
Scale factor for the \"drop\" button width
Scale height of the movement buttons by the amount below
Scale factor for movement button height
Fling Left or Right to quickly slide in that direction
Pieces automatically land and lock when dragged downward (prevents downward leans)
Include on-screen turn buttons (smaller gesture area, but allows 180 turns)
Distance pieces are dragged compared to gesture
Eagerness to "fling" a piece upon release
Full-screen the game by hiding the status bar
Full-screen menus by hiding the status bar
Full-screen multiplayer lobbies by hiding the status bar
Full-screen games for full immersion: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Hide status bar in menus: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Hide status bar in lobbies: SETTING_VALUE_STRING_XXXX
Automatically send your ranked game scores to the global leaderboards
Show the Scoreloop badge when a ranked game ends
More reliable lobby connections when WiFi is available (higher power usage)
Collect anonymous usage data to help fix bugs and improve Quantro
Aggregate your anonymous data with other anonymous users\'. Aggregated data is less detailed but less useful.
